I would hesitate to recommend the Hagakure for anything other than a study of 
Bushido.  You aren't likely to find much in the way of "samurai" knowledge.


>>>>You should look try reading the "Hagakure".  It is probably something that 
will help you out in your quest for samurai knowledge.

-Mr.Matt13
